medical_history.chief_complaint: Short stature with accelerated bone maturation and early growth cessation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Growth rate has been below normal since at least 2 years of age, with bone age markedly advanced. The affected individuals have histories of childhood short stature and early growth cessation, with bone ages remaining approximately 4 years advanced chronologically on repeat assessments.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Affected individuals have normal endocrine evaluations, and one individual has a history of well-controlled type 1 diabetes mellitus diagnosed at age 9.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes similar features of short stature and early growth cessation in affected relatives, including mothers and siblings.
